original_text: What I tell you is this: You should love the people who want to hurt you. If people want to give you pain, pray for them. Pray that God would help them.
korean_text: 나는 너희에게 이르노니 너희 원수를 사랑하며 너희를 박해하는 자를 위하여 기도하라

sentences.original_text: What I tell you is this:
If people want to give you pain,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 사람들이 너에게 고통을 주려고 한다면,

sentences.original_text: Pray that God would help them.
